trans-unit.source: Represents items inside containers that are virtualized and need to be made fully accessible as UI Automation elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示虚拟化并且需要进行完全可访问性 UI 自动化元素的容器内的项。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.VirtualizedItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.VirtualizedItemPatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.VirtualizedItemPatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>, to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式标识符传递到方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>，用于检索指定<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感兴趣的控件模式</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 使虚拟项完全可访问性 UI 自动化元素。
